review: Such a fun game, keeps me playing for hours and hours, and it has basicly become a race to getting all the items in the game. You are always ungrading equipment or trying to get a new stronger weapon from some rare mob drop which sometimes leave you farming an area for some time. The best part is sterminating the bosses once your equipment and armour have gotten strong enough.
